{"body": {"name": "DevHub Developer Contributor report by Vadim for 2024-03-05 - 2024-03-31", "summary": "Finished near macro, updated neardevhub contract according to it, created page for all the communities\\\\\\' news, did small fixes for neardevhub contract and near-sdk-rs", "category": "Tooling & Infrastructure", "timeline": {"status": "REVIEW", "sponsor_requested_review": false, "reviewer_completed_attestation": false}, "supervisor": "frol.near", "description": "I am submitting this contributor report as a contributor led by @frol.near\\\\n\\\\nThis is my 3rd contributor report. You can find my previous report [here](https://near.social/devhub.near/widget/app?page=proposal&id=3)\\\\n# Project Details and Timeline\\\\nOverall, finished near macro, updated neardevhub contract according to it, created page for all the communities\\\\\\' news, did small fixes for neardevhub contract and near-sdk-rs\\\\n\\\\n## Week 1, Mar 11 - Mar 17\\\\n[7.5h] - Monday - Changed devgovgigs notification to devhub for proposals. Added a check that moderator can\\\\\\'t change the timeline without supervisor [#101](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-contract/pull/101), changed near_bindgen to near and removed serialize derives in compilation tests. Researched how to set up contract metadata\\\\n[3.5h] - Tuesday - Added notifier to notifications [#102](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-contract/pull/102), added contract_metadata to near macro, fixed compilation tests and added them to CI\\\\n[1h] - Wednesday - Research on inability to edit proposal as a moderator\\\\n[3h] - Thursday - Solution for inability to edit proposal + docs for near macro\\\\n[8.5h] - Friday - review edits for near macro, merged [#1147 sdk](https://github.com/near/near-sdk-rs/pull/1147), update devhub contract, near macro for types in near_sdk, research on problems with NearSchema, start work on removing NearSchema from near macro\\\\n\\\\n## Week 2, Mar 18 - Mar 24:\\\\n[2h] - Monday - fixed problems with nearschema for lookupmap, research on a problem with TokenMetadata\\\\n[0.5h] - Wednesday - meeting\\\\n[1h] - check moderators, repost devhub posts for social.near\\\\n[10h] - created pr for adding communities feed [#104](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-contract/pull/104), updated text for repost of proposal to socialdb [#105](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-contract/pull/105)\\\\n[9.5h] - fixed tests for communities feed, solved problem with TokenMetadata and some other structs in near macro and switched from borshserialize to near for some cases.\\\\n\\\\n## Week 3, Mar 25 - Mar 31:\\\\n[2h] - Monday - Fixed CurveType adding use_borsh_crate=false, attributes discussion\\\\n[6.5h] - Tuesday - figured out how to use serializers=[borsh(use_discriminant=false)] with darling\\\\n[6h] - Wednesday - implemented #[near(serializers = [borsh(use_discriminant = true)]) in near macro, removed derive(borshserialize) for all types\\\\n[9h] - Thursday - fixed errors in near macro, refactored and added tests [#1558 sdk](https://github.com/near/near-sdk-rs/pull/1158), removed borshserialize from all types, rebased and updated near-sdk in neardevhub contract [#103](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-contract/pull/103), [created](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-contract/pull/104#issuecomment-2025855139) command to follow existing communities \\\\n[6.5h] -
